metadata.synopsis: Orhton's ambush starts because players were found at the upper floor of the Orthon's lair.
metadata.how_to_trigger: goto -653; 4; -781Move towards -661; 4; -762 and start the encounter.

0.speaker: Yurgir
0.text: Think you can get the drop on me? Wrong. Merregons - rip out their lungs!
0.context: NodeContext: Mer-eh-gone. Angry/hostile (player sneaked up on him)
